definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: In the spirit of gender-equality, a male-only carriage must be introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本着男女平等的精神，必須設立男士專用車廂。

sentences.english: And male's high-heel shoes may consider as a symbol of feministic.
sentences.chinese: 男性的高跟鞋，我可以當做是男女平等的另一個象徵。

sentences.english: Mr. Netanyahu also pointed to the ruling as upholding equality between men and women.
sentences.chinese: 內坦尼亞胡還指出，這項判決維持了男女平等的原則。

sentences.english: Yet the process of achieving gender equality is still an ongoing one.
sentences.chinese: 然而爭取男女平等的過程仍然是一項未竟之業。

sentences.english: Suffragettes were among the first feminists in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 爭取選舉權的婦女是英國最早的男女平等主義者。

sentences.english: Equality between men and women is fully justified.
sentences.chinese: 男女平等實屬天經地義。

sentences.english: In this country women are clamo(u)ring for improvements in the sexual equality laws.
sentences.chinese: 在這個國家裏，婦女在呼籲要完善男女平等的法律。

sentences.english: Back then, ensuring equal rights for both men and women was made a national policy, enabling women to engage themselves in working and production.
sentences.chinese: 男女平等被定爲國策，所有婦女都參加生產勞動。

sentences.english: Feminists began to push for equality in their educations and careers.
sentences.chinese: 男女平等主義者開始推動在教育和職業上的平等。

definition: to regard men as superior to women (idiom)
Woman can hold up half the sky/fig. nowadays, women have an equal part to play in society
pinyin: fu4 nu:3 neng2 ding3 ban4 bian1 tian1

definition: Confucian moral injunctions for women, namely: obey in turn three men father, husband and son, plus the four virtues of morality 德, physical charm 容, propriety in speech 言 and efficiency in needlework 功
a woman's virtue is to have no talent (idiom)
pinyin: nu:3 zi3 wu2 cai2 bian4 shi4 de2

definition: forced marriage/arranged marriage (without the consent of the individuals)
